RelatedSentence: Nicholasville - based Alltech , an animal nutrition company , will build a distillery and brewery in Eastern Kentucky .
The project is geared toward helping the region develop economically , the Lexington Herald - Leader reported .

RelatedSentence: Alltech operates a brewery and distillery in Lexington and a distillery in Ireland .
Alltech is buying property on Second Street in downtown Pikeville for the brewery and distillery .
